name: Omega No Sunshine 2
storyline:
this is the story of you,as a random citizen from your world, but well too much pollution and the sun is disappearing meaning the world is near to come at its end.an old legend make you hopeful, by collecting sun rings you might make the sun appear again but...you are the only one to see them, and saving the world might have a price.
will you let your world disappear or will you bring a brighter future on our families ?
it is time to act.
summary:
This game is an arcade-collectathon-exploration game where an unknow being is doing its best to avoid the end of his/her world because of the sun disappearing. Through different places the player have to run and collect sun rings to progress ever further. The game include a story, additional content and a rpg oriented dlc. The base game minimum game time is at least about 16hours.

This video game is born after omega no sunshine 1 (2019) made by the galoxyum studio.
